Adventure Guildsman:
Welcome! Romance, adventure, the thrill of peril, dreams of overnight fortunes... My guild's information can make all of that come true!
That's not all. We are also exchanging Adveneturer's Marks and Seals that you get from your adventures.
Believe me, I've got some adventures that will knock your socks off! In fact, I've got one that's perfect for you!
